transcripts: Most important to know is that the glasses are fragile. You pick up your glasses and you need to know the thinnest part of your glass is the ring. This is where you don't want to touch because you might have some breakage. The widest part of your glass is the base. mostly here you will not you will get a wonderful son from The Glass. So what you do is tilt your glasses belly to belly sideways this is how you properly toast with your friends with your glasses because in the end wine appreciation is all about the senses
